title: Into the Shadows
description: Belle Doran has pretended to be human all her life. What no one knows is that she actually has a rare magic. She has the ability to destroy anything she touches. While the world is full of Mages, Witches, Shifters and other Revealed, Belle hasn’t ever heard of anyone with her gift. So, she hides it.After living most of her life as a nomad, she’s finally settled in Boston. She makes ends meet as a freelance bounty hunter, but she remains under the magical radar. That is until she meets Alex Livi, a powerful Earth Mage.Belle wants to keep her distance but something about him makes her curious. When that curiosity leads her into a situation where she’s forced to use her magic, she knows her life will never be the same. If the government or Mages Council knew about her unique magic, she doesn’t know what would happen. But she knows they would come after her.Find out what happens when we go Into the Shadows.
author: Brenna Barrett
